Text: thank youThank you very much for giving Gordon and me so much time It was a real pleasure seeing you again and I certainly hope we get to do something together Gordon and Greg are going to continue their discussion around specific issues For IFC I am actively talking to your team on weather insurance and think we can proceed It would good for me to stay in touch with youI have already explained to Peter Woicke the head of IFC that Enron and GEC are really the models for us in modern finance and markets If you ever have time in Washington please do give a call Have a wonderful holiday season Best Nina
